Html: I just found this project and downloaded it.  One glance through the source code and I am immediately impressed.  I've been looking for something like this for years.  I've also been looking at the Gardens Point Parser Generator, but I really love the idea of being able to build the grammar directly in C#.  The generic, grammar-independent ScriptInterpreter class is also a much welcomed part of the toolkit that you typically don't find in other compiler construction frameworks.  I'm looking to add some runtime scripting capabilities to my app, and this project looks like just the ticket to do it with.  And then there's the Grammar Explorer.  Awesome.
